description: ICS techniques used by WannaCry, ATT&CK software S0366 (v1.1)
name: WannaCry (S0366)

techniques.comment: [WannaCry](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0366) initially infected IT networks, but by means of an exploit (particularly the SMBv1-targeting MS17-010 vulnerability) spread to industrial networks. (Citation: Joe Slowik April 2019)
[WannaCry](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0366) can move laterally through industrial networks by means of the SMB service. (Citation: Joe Slowik April 2019)
